Text: Abu ki Jihofa aka ñw e̩ne̩-wñ kʼi fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji kʼowñ che Sairo̩s,
Natʼuwe̩ o̩gba,
nakʼe̩wñ akoko e̩chubi ñw e̩,
Todu Jeko̩b, adu-mi,
Omi che Jihofa, omune̩ du la de̩ n,
kʼama ki ma akwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu
Omi abo̩ ugane̩ te̩, u la anyi e̩chubi,
O efojale, kito̩ kwʼate̩ le̩ wane̩,
Atogwo ñw e̩ne̩ ki abʼAcho̩na-wñ ja,
Atogwo ñw e̩ne̩ ki aka ñw ata-wñ kakini, E̩wñ e̩ bi-i? abe̩k i aka ñw onobule̩ kakini, Efu e̩wñ e̩ che-i?
Abu ki Jihofa,
Omi fʼile̩-i che te̩,
Omi dʼu kwane̩ ef o̩kpakpa,
Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
Ochochi, uwe̩ chʼO̩jo̩ kʼe̩ dʼo̩la-we̩ maja,
Anyo̩ amu ma; ochochi, eju-ma aku e̩bo̩no̩ chaka,
Jihofa muda anʼujadu o̩gbegbele̩ jadu Israe̩l;
Todu abu ki Jihofa, ki nyi efojale efojale,
U ka maja
Me̩ kʼo̩la-me̩ jeju ku me̩ lewa,
Ame̩ ki ka dufu, me̩ ko dufu wa;
Me̩ rʼeju da go mi, kʼama ki fʼume̩ jadu,
U fʼo̩la-mi onugo go̩ me̩,
Ma anʼo̩la-mi aka kakini, Chai efu Jihofa
Ma adale ñw ugbe̩ Israe̩l chaka efu Jihofa,
